components.name: wruiyh
components.content:
In this section, we'll ask about:

  • business plan (document upload)

components.name: qZNAHj
components.content:
Business plan for your project (document upload)

Read the relevant section of the fund prospectus for more detail of what to include in your business plan.

Upload your business plan.

Include any information that supports the answers in your application. All figures must match those you've given in the management case section.

It should be a single file no bigger than 5MB in any of the following formats:

  • jpg
  • jpeg
  • png
  • pdf
  • txt
  • doc
  • docx
  • odt
  • csv
  • xls
  • xlsx
  • ods

Your business plan could include:

Funding details

  • project costs
  • capital costs
  • revenue costs
  • total request for funding (capital costs plus revenue costs)
  • match funding details
  • funding you have already secured, with supporting evidence
  • funding you still need to secure
  • how long it will likely take to secure outstanding match funding
  • financial forecasts, including:
    • income sources
    • costs with an evidenced set of assumptions
    • why you’ll need revenue funding and how you’ll use it
    • cashflow
  • your most recent audited accounts covering the last 3 years
  • a bank account in your organisation’s name
Asset details
  • independent valuation of the asset (if you intend to buy it), with supporting evidence
  • completed or planned feasibility studies, with supporting evidence
  • planned activities or services that will take place in the community asset
  • any supporting evidence that you will deliver the benefits to the community you have outlined
  • planned skills or resources needed to manage the asset
  • your experience of delivering similar projects
  • any relevant project management expertise
  • roles you plan to recruit to help you manage the asset
Organisation details
  • your organisation’s governance and membership structures, with supporting evidence
  • members of your board, including their:
    • role
    • main responsibilities
  • copies of your organisation’s memorandum and articles of association
  • a copy of your most recent governance board meeting minutes
  • supporting evidence of how you will manage finances and prevent fraud. For example, copies of your policy documents
  • supporting evidence of how you will manage performance and risks. For example, copies of your policy documents

conditions.displayName: Do you want to upload a business plan-yes
